DOC.detailed_description: Some previous animal model study reveal electroacupuncture ( EA ) apply specific acupoints , Zhongwan Zusanli acupoint , reduce plasma glucose level encourage insulin secretion , even improve insulin resistance . In study , want observe result type II diabetic patient diagnose five year study design randomize control trial ( RCT ) obtain evidence clinical . We undertake randomize , single blind sham group control study evaluate effect EA frequency 15 Hz fix intensity ( 10 mA ) human Zusanli acupoint . A total 26 newly diagnostic type II diabetic patient enrol study . They randomly divide 2 group . There 13 patient experimental group ( EG ) EA treatment , 13 patient divide control group ( CG ) sham treatment . The main outcome change laboratory parameter 30 minute test .
